glyclean 0.1.0
  • Reference

Automatic Data Preprocessing

auto_clean.Rd

Perform automatic data preprocessing on glycoproteomics data. Calling rauto_clean(exp) equals to:

Usage

auto_clean(exp, to_level = c("gf", "gp", "gfs", "gps"))

Arguments

exp

A glyexp_experiment object containing glycoproteomics data.

to_level

The aggregation level. Default is "gf" (glycoform). See aggregate() for details.

Value

A modified glyexp_experiment object

Details

exp |>
  remove_missing_variables(prop = 0.5) |>
  median_normalize() |>
  zero_impute() |>
  aggregate(to_level = "gf")
